alternate_strategies_for_dynamic_selecti.condition: Liquid spilling over the edge or missing the target.

strategy_options.description: Reduce the speed of the pour to have more control over the liquid flow.
Adjust the container's angle to ensure the spout is directed properly toward the target.
Place a funnel or guide over the target container to direct the flow more accurately.

alternate_strategies_for_dynamic_selecti.condition: The wrong amount of liquid is poured into the target container.

strategy_options.description: Switch to a measuring cup to accurately control the amount of liquid being poured.
Pause the pouring process, reassess the angle, and control the amount poured more carefully.
Pour slowly to avoid overfilling the target container and adjust the flow rate.

alternate_strategies_for_dynamic_selecti.condition: Liquid drips or leaves residual liquid after pouring.

strategy_options.description: After pouring, wipe the spout to stop any drips or residual liquid from falling.
Adjust the angle of the container to ensure the liquid flows fully without dripping.
Switch to a container with a better-designed spout to minimize residual drips.

alternate_strategies_for_dynamic_selecti.condition: The container is unstable or difficult to control during pouring.

strategy_options.description: Place the container on a flat surface or hold it with both hands to provide more stability.
Switch to a smaller container for more control during the pouring process.
Stop and reassess the container's position to ensure stability before continuing.

alternate_strategies_for_dynamic_selecti.condition: The spout is not aligned with the target container, causing spillage or inaccurate pouring.

strategy_options.description: Visually align the spout with the target container before resuming pouring.
Place a funnel to ensure that the liquid is poured into the right spot.
Pour from a lower height to reduce the risk of missing the target or spilling.
